Recommendation LCS data elements:
Data ElementDescriptionFormal Representation
Patient age in years based on date of birthPatient age as calculated using Patient.birthDateLungCancerScreening."Patient age in years based on date of birth"
Smoking status observationSmoking Status as represented using the US Core Smoking Status profileLungCancerScreening."Smoking status observation"
Lung cancer diagnosisConditions with a clinical status of active, recurrence, or relapse, and a code in the Lung Cancer value set.LungCancerScreening."Lung cancer diagnosis"
Chest CT procedureProcedures with a status of completed and a code in the Chest CT Procedure Codes value setLungCancerScreening."Chest CT procedure"
